ing: 2 (16 ounce) packages frozen whipped topping, thawed
des: "This recipe is light and fluffy, and if you like fruit, you'll love this dish!"
ins: In a large bowl, mix the thawed frozen whipped topping, sour cream, sugar, lemon juice, pineapple, maraschino cherries, bananas and pecans. Chill in the refrigerator approximately 2 hours before serving.
